content.prompt: In 1558 Queen Elizabeth issued a decree that attempted to restrict and control the manner of preaching and religious teachings in England. Her action best represents which of the following?

choices.label: Efforts to strengthen the central government by curbing the power of the aristocracy
Cultural changes as a result of contact with non-European societies during the voyages of exploration
Growing secularization in political philosophy as influenced by Machiavelli and other writers
Monarchical reforms designed to give governments greater control over religion and morality

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
